```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df <- read_csv('allgr_array_KianaRawdat.csv')
glimpse(df)
```

```{r}
library(lme4)
model1 <- lmer(temp.avg ~ array + (1 | grove), data = df)
summary(model1)
```

```{r}
library(performance)
check_model(model1)
```

```{r}
model2 <- lmer(temp.avg ~ grove + (1 | array), data = df)
summary(model2)
check_model(model2)
```
